articles.title: Lypertek Levi True Wireless Earphones With 6mm Dynamic Drivers, Up to 48-Hour Battery Launched in India - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Lypertek Levi TWS earphones have been launched as a successor to the Tevi true wireless earphones. Priced at Rs. 5,999, the earphones support SBC and AAC Bluetooth codecs, and offer a battery life of 48 hours.
